title: Plant Leaf Disease Detection using Faster R-CNN and SSD Model
description: A hybrid deep learning model combining Faster R-CNN and SSD for accurate detection and classification of plant leaf diseases. Built with PyTorch and trained on the PlantVillage and PlantDoc datasets for robust performance.

title: Artistly — Book Artists for Events
description: A modern web platform that connects event planners with talented artists—singers, DJs, dancers, and speakers—making it easy to browse by category and contact performers for booking.

title: RecipeHolder
description: A user-friendly web app designed to help you discover and save a variety of recipes daily.
